title: The 10 best sales and deals you can shop this weekend
text:
The 10 best sales and deals you can shop this weekend

Save on everything from your home to the slopes. (Photo: Reviewed / REI)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

As the work week winds down, it gets me excited for all the things I can do in my free time. Most importantly, online shop. Right now there are a ton of incredible sales going on at popular retailers like Wayfair, Anthropologie, and REI, which means you can save big at the places you were already going to shop at. Here are our 10 favorite sales happening this weekend.

1. Up to 50% off: High-end cookware at Sur la Table

The most popular cookware brands were at some of their lowest prices with this sale. (Photo: Sur la Table)

For an upgrade to your old cookware, we highly recommend checking out this sale from Sur la Table. Right now, you can get up to 50% off high-end cookware brands like Le Creuset, All-Clad, Staub, and more. It's a great time to get that Dutch oven you've always wanted or get nonstick skillets that will last a lifetime.

Shop the entire Sur la Table cookware sale

2. 25% off: Snow and skiing essentials at REI

Hit the slopes with incredible savings on winter essentials. (Photo: REI)

If you're planning of hitting the slopes this winter, you can save big on skiing and snowboarding essentials with REI's Snow Big Deal Sale. You can get 25% off all Swix and North waxing and tuning products as well as big discounts on jackets, boots, and lift passes at popular mountains. You can also snag 20% off one class, day tour, or event with REI with the code SNOW4DAYS19.

Shop the REI Snow Big Deal Sale

3. Extra 40% off: Anthropologie's sale section

Find fall essentials, amazing home decor, and more at great prices for AnthroDay. (Photo: Anthropologie)

There is nothing better than a sale on sale, especially when its at Anthropologie. Typically this popular clothing and home decor retailer is a little out of budget, but right now you can save an extra 40% off their already discounted sale items. This is huge for any Anthropologie lover and a great chance to update your fall wardrobe.

Shop Anthropologie sale and get an extra 40% off

4. 20% off: Any item at Spirit Halloween

Spirit Halloween is the place to get the hottest costumes of the year. (Photo: Spirit Halloween)

Halloween is right around the corner, and if you haven't figured out your costume yet, it's time to get on that. Spirit Halloween stores are a go-to for most people, especially if you want to try a costume on before buying it, and they're also a fun spot to shop for spooky decor and party accessories as well. Right now, you can save 20% on a single item with the code TAKE20, or choose $10 2-day shipping with the promo code 2DAY or $50 overnight shipping with the code NEXTDAY19, if you buy online.

Shop Spirit Halloween and save 20%

5. Save 15%: The best meat thermometers and grilling tools

Need a gift idea for him? Look no further than this Thermoworks sale. (Photo: Reviewed/Lindsay D. Mattison)

Cooking holiday turkey and ham is tough. You either undercook it or, worse, overcook it and are left with a sad feast. But that can be remedied with the help of a solid meat thermometer. Right now, you can take 15% off all five meat thermometers their probe thermometers, including our favorites, the ChefAlarm (on sale for $54.40) and the Dot (on sale for $36.55).

Shop the Thermoworks Barbecue sale and get 15% off probe thermometers

6. Up to 70% off: Kitchen furniture and products at Wayfair

Save on pots, pans, and furniture sets. (Photo: Wayfair)

There's few things better than a kitchen sale, and right now Wayfair is offering up to 70% off kitchen furniture, small appliances, and cookware. While furniture sales are quite common at the massive online retailer, it's rarer to see great deals on cooking gadgets. This sale is a great time to get pieces to renovate your kitchen, or get shiny new products to display on your countertop.

Shop the Wayfair Semi-Annual Kitchen Event

7. Get 20% off if you spend $100 at Madewell

Shop the Madewell sale happening now. (Photo: Madewell)

When it comes to fall stapes, Madewell has some of the coziest, trendiest pieces out there. Right now, you can get 20% off your entire order if you spend $100 with the code NEWLEAF. You can easily spend $100 by adding two or three items to your cart, so getting an extra 20% is a pretty sweet deal.

Shop Madewell and save 20%

8. $100 off: An incredible 55-inch TCL Roku TV

Give the gift of a great TV at a reasonable price. (Photo: Reviewed / Lee Neikirk)

If you want a great TV or want to gift one to your loved ones this year, we recommend going with a TCL Series 6, which has built-in Roku and great picture quality for the price. Right now, you can get a 55-inch model of this TV for just $400 at Best Buy. That's $100 off and the lowest price we've ever seen for this model.

Get the TCL 55-inch Smart 4K Roku TV at Best Buy for $399.99 (Save $100)

9. 50% off: Almost everything at Shutterfly

Print out your most cherished photo memories with Shutterfly. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Whether you're looking for a unique wedding gift or are finally getting around to printing out the pictures from your vacation, you can save big. Right now, you can get 50% off everything at Shutterfly, including personalized school gear, no promo code needed. This is our favorite online printing photo service, and you can also get free shipping on orders over $49 with the promo code SHIP49.

Get 50% off almost everything at Shutterfly

10. $200 off: An amazing Dyson cordless vacuum

Stop lugging that old vacuum around the house. (Photo: Dyson)

While Dyson is renowned for their award-winning vacuums, they usually cost quite the chunk of change, but not today. Right now, you can get a Dyson V7 Animal Vacuum for $200 off, bringing the price down to $200. When we've tested other cordless Dyson vacuums, we found that they had some of the best suction and battery life of all the vacuums we've tested. You can expect a similar performance from the V7.

Get the Dyson V7 Animal Vacuum at Dyson for $199.99 (Save $200)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
